name: terraform
postCreateCommand: for tool in packer_1.8.2 terraform_1.2.4; do curl https://releases.hashicorp.com/${tool%_*}/${tool#*_}/${tool}_linux_amd64.zip | zcat | dd of=/usr/bin/${tool%_*} && chmod 755 /usr/bin/${tool%_*}; done && go install github.com/automation-co/husky@v0.2 && husky install
